biases.name: NEUTRAL
biases.description: With the embassy dissapearing, it is unsure what the Suokan government intends with this move.
biases.headline: The Suokan embassy in Zuania dissapears from one day to the next
biases.text: Seemingly from one day to another, the Suokan embassy's building has been sold and reconverted into a school. The government of Suoka has not made any public statement about it; however, all the diplomats and ex-pats in Zuania have returned home or have been reallocated to other countries.

biases.name: RISING TENSION
biases.headline: The Suokan embassy in Zuania is now empty
biases.text: In a sign of support towards Xaya, the Suokan embassy has been abandoned by their government. They have not made any public statement about it; however, all the diplomats and ex-pats in Zuania have returned home or have been reallocated to more stable countries.

biases.name: AGGRESSION
biases.description: Clearly a sign of aggression and Suokan lining up with Xaya
biases.headline: Zuania in peril
biases.text: In a sign of rising tensions, the Suokan embassy has been emptied and repurposed. The government of Suoka has refused to make any public statement. Unsurprisingly, all the diplomats and ex-pats in Zuania have returned home or have been reallocated to other countries.
